body:
# EmbArBB 

## About 
EmbArBB is an EDSL for data parallel programming hosted in Haskell. 

## Documentation
(Coming soon)

# ArBB-VM Bindings 
Haskell bindings for the ArBB-VM at github [(link)](http://github.com/svenssonjoel/arbb-vm)

# Reading 
[Programming Future Parallel Architectures with Haskell and ArBB](http://www.cse.chalmers.se/~joels/writing/faspp2011_haskell_arbb.pdf)

(Coming soon)[Parallel Programming in Haskell Almost for Free](coming soon)
tagline: A Haskell Embedding of Intel's  Array Building Blocks (ArBB)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: EmbArBB
